arts.ttl: Liverpool already have Trent Alexander-Arnold replacement lined up
arts.sum: The future of Trent Alexander-Arnold at Liverpool remains up in the air and should the 25-year-old leave Anfield at the end of the season, the Merseyside club already have a replacement lined up ahead of the 2025/26 campaign. Alexander-Arnold’s contract with Liverpool expires in 2025 and there has been no sign of a new one […] The post Liverpool already have Trent Alexander-Arnold replacement lined up appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Ings, Cresswell and Soler make first starts of season at Anfield
arts.sum: Danny Ings, Aaron Cresswell and Carlos Soler make their first competitive starts of the season, while Łukasz Fabiański, Jean-Clair Todibo, Vladimír Coufal and Tomáš Souček also come into the side. A strong bench is named too by Lopetegui, with Aaron Wan-Bissaka, Konstantinos Mavropanos, Emerson, Guido Rodríguez, Mohammed Kudus, Lucas Paquetá and Michail Antonio to call upon, while Andy Irving, who caught the eye during his Premier League debut on Saturday, completes the matchday squad.

arts.ttl: Steidten Wanted 2x Champion Instead of Lopetegui at West Ham
arts.sum: Tim Steidten preferred to appoint a two-time league champion over Julen Lopetegui at West Ham during the summer to replace David Moyes.
